Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS
REFERRED TO CORPORATIONS, AUTHORITIES AND COMMISSIONS

Title: Exempts residents of lower Manhattan and Staten Island from congestion surcharge pricing
Summary: Exempts residents of lower Manhattan and Staten Island from the congestion surcharge imposed under the tax law.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to exempting residents of lower Manhattan and Staten Island from congestion surcharge pricing
